item.title: Apple Watch
item.description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services.

item.title: Can this damage my goggle?
item.description: No. This does not require or make changes to your DJI Goggles in any way. The goggle is working as intended by the manufacturer.

item.title: Galaxy Watch
item.description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services.

item.title: How can I contribute?
item.description: Not a developer but still want to help out? There’s a few projects on the go at the moment, here’s links to donate to them!

item.title: How much does this software cost?
item.description: Absolutely nothing. This software is licensed under MIT. It is free to use and modify as you see fit.

item.title: Redmi Watch
item.description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services.

item.title: What video transmitters are supported?
item.description: Air Unit, Caddx Vista’s (Along with all vista-compaitble cameras)

item.title: Which Goggles are Supported?
item.description: Both Version 1 and Version 2 of the DJI FPV Goggle are supported.

item.title: Which Operating Systems are supported?
item.description: Windows, Linux, Chrome, MacOS, Android. iPhone will is not supported with no plans to be supported. This is due to a limitation of the device.
